Detailed Description

Used for printing out game to a peripheral printer. (1) use start_print(); to start printing doc (2) use open_page(); to start a new page (3) set font by using dfont(); and put_? functions to add text or bmp (4) use end_page();to end a page (5) use endprint(); to end printing doc.
